document.title: The Journey Metaphor’s Entailments for Framing Learning
document.abstract: Analysis of differing frames for learning to write shows that the journey metaphor best serves our efforts to convey how writing and learning are linked.
document.publication-title: The Journal of the Assembly for Expanded Perspectives on Learning

field.name: acknowledgements
